reviews.review: What a disappointment. So many unfunny and cringy jokes. Do not waste your time with this awful attempt at comedy as a movie.
one of the worst movies i have ever seen. one and a half hour of ads
The Emoji Movie helped me realize the meaning of life. I can't believe there would be a universe with an outcome of this movie not being made. The Emoji Movie deserves better!
I ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT. I FEEL THAT IS GIVES THE VIEWING AUDIENCE AN ACCURATE DEPICTION OF LIFE INSIDE YOUR PHONE. 10/10 WOULD RECCOMEND TO AN AUDIENCE AROUND 16-20 YEARS OF AGE

An exceptional portrayal of the ever dynamic and evolving adolescent culture. The stark animation and brilliant score are sublime in their simplicity. A truly unique perspective and never-before explored insight of an untouched emoticon universe; erected to provoke curiosity in viewers, it extends far beyond the realm of fiction and surpasses the threshold between mere fantasy and scientific wonder. To whomever believes that this movie deserves a feeble 8%, you obviously do not have the academic capabilities to appreciate the silent yet deafening depth of this film. The film shows the complex communicative nuances among society through a non-lingual medium. Most viewers cannot recognize the depth of this highly conceptual art; the seemingly base nature of the film separates the truly devoted viewers from those who seek shallow entertainment. This is what makes the Emoji Movie a cinematic masterpiece and a revolutionary art form few can appreciate.
This movie makes using the TV as a baby sitter look like a responsible parenting decision. Sadly it's likely to be turned into a tv series within the next year.
You cant describe how bad this movie is..
This movie didn't have much of a concept, you took a good idea, and made it stupid. I would've given this movie a zero, but I couldn't
Honestly it wasn't as bad as I thought it would be. It was actually alright, I didn't like it but I didn't not like it.

This movie was the best thing that ever happened to me. It is so amazing! The animation is very colorful, the music fits perfectly within the different scenes, and the storyline was perfect! Just be yourself.
